description:
Fix 3D-CSS transform printing - proxy device origin.

Depends on Skia r2108,2116

BUG=82746
TEST=print http://www.webkit.org/blog-files/3d-transforms/poster-circle.html

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=96920

messages.text:
LGTM. Roll 2114 is in. 2116 should follow shortly.

http://codereview.chromium.org/7620016/diff/3001/skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc
File skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/7620016/diff/3001/skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc#newcode190
skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc:190: vector_device->pdf_device_->setOrigin(vector_device->getOrigin().fX,
Nit: Can we move this logic up one line?

http://codereview.chromium.org/7620016/diff/3001/skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc
File skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/7620016/diff/3001/skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc#newcode190
skia/ext/vector_platform_device_skia.cc:190: vector_device->pdf_device_->setOrigin(vector_device->getOrigin().fX,
On 2011/08/16 00:30:57, Chris Guillory wrote:

Done.

subject: Fix 3D-CSS transform printing - proxy device origin.
